issue.title: Protect `get_completion_signatures` fold expression from overloaded commas

discussion.p: The fold expression can pick up overloaded comma operators.

blockquote.pre: template<class Sndr, class... Env> static consteval void default-impls::check-types();

blockquote.p: -40- Let `Is` be the pack of integral template arguments of the `integer_sequence` specialization denoted by indices-for<Sndr>.
